doc:
Jean-Paul Roussillon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Paul_Roussillon 0 Jean-Paul Roussillon (5 March 1931 – 31 July 2009) was a French actor. He appeared in 87 films and television shows between 1954 and 2008. He starred in the film Playing 'In the Company of Men', which was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 2003 Cannes Film Festival. He won the César Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in A Christmas Tale. Jean-Paul_Roussillon ( 5_March_1931 – 31_July_2009 ) was a_French_actor . He appeared in 87_films_and_television_shows between 1954_and_2008 . He starred in the_film Playing ' In the_Company of Men ' , which was_screened in the_Un_Certain_Regard_section at the_2003_Cannes_Film_Festival . He won the_César_Award for Best Supporting_Actor for his_role in A_Christmas_Tale .
